decoworld.model.world.safehouse.furniture

Class Chest

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.safehouse.furniture.Chest

  • public class Chest
extends java.lang.Object
    This subclass of container will be a place in each player's home where they can store extra items to create space in their inventory Invariant: chest != null (can, however, be empty chest), chest doesn't contain null items, or repeat items all items in chest are valid player items items are either in chest or inventory, not both user != null, user is a valid user in the game
